scripts.start: PORT=9282 DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true FAST_REFRESH=true GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" craco start
scripts.kill-port: for pid in $(lsof -ti:9282 2>/dev/null); do ps -p $pid -o comm= | grep -q node && kill $pid 2>/dev/null || true; done
scripts.dev: PORT=9282 DANGEROUSLY_DISABLE_HOST_CHECK=true FAST_REFRESH=true GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=512" craco start
scripts.build: CI=false DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=false TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=1024" react-scripts build
scripts.deploy:simple: npm run build && rm -rf ../backend/static/* && cp -r build/* ../backend/static/
